name: Dragon's Breath
description: Dragon's Breath is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between the two legendary strains, Jack Herer and Northern Lights. Its balanced, clear-headed effects are ushered in by a distinctive spicy aroma that hints at this hybrid's Haze ancestor. Some patients may find Dragon's Breath particularly helpful in burning off pain, depression, and anxiety throughout the day.
attributes_title: Creative, Energetic, Happy, Talkative, Uplifted, Depression, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
